query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS plans (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  version VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'v1.0',
  logo_url VARCHAR(500),
  featured_image_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  landing_page_url VARCHAR(500),
  category ENUM('Pago', 'Gratuito') NOT NULL,
  edital_status ENUM('Pré-edital', 'Pós-edital', 'N/A') DEFAULT 'N/A',
  entity VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(255),
  tags JSON DEFAULT ('[]'),
  knowledge_root_id VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
  paywall_required BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  price DECIMAL(10,2),
  validity_date DATE,
  duration_days INT,
  status ENUM('Ativo', 'Expirado', 'Oculto', 'Em edição') DEFAULT 'Em edição' NOT NULL,
  is_featured BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  mentor_id INT,
  created_by INT,
  updated_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  deleted_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  custom_settings JSON DEFAULT ('{}'),
  INDEX idx_plans_public_list (status, is_featured, category, created_at),
  INDEX idx_plans_entity_role (entity, role),
  INDEX idx_plans_mentor (mentor_id),
  INDEX idx_plans_expired (validity_date),
  INDEX idx_plans_knowledge_root (knowledge_root_id),
  UNIQUE INDEX idx_unique_featured_plan (is_featured)
)

  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,

  custom_settings JSON DEFAULT ('{}'),
